channel.title: Summer's End Switch and Game Keys Giveaway!
channel.description:
![switchGiveaway2018|500x500](upload://1VAFHA2zgbBvfeIKVSomCHiCIYC.jpeg)
The [Court Wizard](https://tol.wikia.com/wiki/The_Court_Wizard) is known best for *switching* ability targets with his *Tornado* class night ability. However, this time, it did not work as expected. This tornado ripped through realms and returned some foreign object that has no use within the castle. No one even knows what it does.
However, because it is not of this realm, we do know it holds value to collectors of the sort. The Court has decided to grant this relic to those that advocate the Throne.
Both citizens of the Kingdom and those that have not even heard of Castle Adiart may all enter via this sorcery:
[![steam-update-switchGiveawayPrev-290x107|290x107](upload://5t5ExLQct3v64W2EpZrrHLQmEcn.png)](http://throneofli.es/switchgiveaway2018) [Enter the Twitter/Discord Contest now!](http://throneofli.es/switchgiveaway2018)
*May fortune be with you throughout all nights.*
